column5: Hey there,  WHen using a kicker mounting bracket, does it really make a difference if a motor is a long or short shaft since the bracket's height can usually adjusted ?  Thanks!
Just in case anyone was thinking this....As long as your using it for a kicker and not a full time outboard......Your main power unit should be fitted directly to your transom.....  Good Luck !!
Hey Chris, yes it would only be used for auxiliary power... so it should not be a problem then?  Thanks for the input...
